messages.title: WHAT THIS ELECTION IS ABOUT
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn. Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.

messages.title: PETER GIBSON BACKS PM'S PLAN FOR BREXIT
messages.content: With just weeks to go until the most important election in Britain for generations Peter knows that Theresa May's strong, stable leadership is the only way to get the best deal for Britain.

messages.title: THERESA MAY TACKLES UNFAIR ENERGY BILLS
messages.content: Theresa May has announced that the next conservative government will introduce a cap on standard energy tariffs to protect ordinary working families from unfair practices. More than 17 million families on standard variable tariffs will benefit.

messages.title: LOCAL SOLICITOR IS CONSERVATIVES CHOICE
messages.content: Peter Gibson is delighted to be the Conservative candidate for Redcar. Peter said: 'As someone born and bred in Redcar, attending the local schools and college, I am delighted to have been chosen.'

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strengthening Britain's Hand in the Brexit Negotiations
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A General Election now will strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe. It is the only way to ensure we have strong leadership, certainty and stability to see us through Brexit and beyond.
We will create more well-paid jobs and ensure that success and prosperity are shared throughout the country.
We will give everyone a chance to get on in life, build a good school place for every child, and provide social services when needed.
We will maintain a strong and united nation by taking action against the extremists who try to divide communities and by supporting the armed forces.
